about_the_game: This DLC unlocks the 18+ Adult Content for "The Queen's Quest". In this DLC, expect to see lesbian sex scenes that include both images of lesbian women having sexual and romantic relations and a tasty tale telling of the action!

content_descriptors.notes: This patch unlocks adult scenes within the game. This adult content features women having lesbian romantic sexual intercourse.

name: The Queen's Quest 18+ Patch
